EventItemActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemTitle: Communication from the Mayor  -  AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, the public officers law and the general municipal law, in relation to establishing in the counties of Nassau and  Suffolk  a  demonstration  program  implementing  speed violation  monitoring  systems in school speed zones by means of photo devices, and in relation to photo speed violation  monitoring  systems in  school  speed zones in the city of New York; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof A.9206 / S.6918
EventItemMatterName: Establishing in the counties of Nassau and Suffolk a demonstration program implementing speed violation monitoring systems in school speed zones.

EventItemActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
EventItemTitle: Communication from the Mayor  -  AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, the public officers law and the general municipal law, in relation to establishing in the counties of Nassau and  Suffolk  a  demonstration  program  implementing  speed violation  monitoring  systems in school speed zones by means of photo devices, and in relation to photo speed violation  monitoring  systems in  school  speed zones in the city of New York; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof A.9206 / S.6918
EventItemMatterName: Establishing in the counties of Nassau and Suffolk a demonstration program implementing speed violation monitoring systems in school speed zones.
